name: Camp Atwater
category: Black-owned Academic summer camps in Massachusetts
description: Founded in 1921, Camp Atwater is the oldest African American-owned and operated residential youth camp in the nation. It offers a variety of programs including STEM activities, nature exploration, arts, and leadership development, aiming to meet the cultural, academic, and social needs of Black youth
